thread.title: 'Wannabe Barbie' with peroxide hair and towering heels' drastic 'make-under' after despairing boyfriend's ultimatum
thread.title_full: 'Wannabe Barbie' with peroxide hair and towering heels' drastic 'make-under' after despairing boyfriend's ultimatum

author: dailyrecord
title: 'Wannabe Barbie' with peroxide hair and towering heels' drastic 'make-under' after despairing boyfriend's ultimatum
text:
Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
A woman described as a ‘ Barbie wannabe’ with peroxide hair, towering heels and low cut top undergoes a stunning make-under on a television show. 
Summer, 21, took part in the Channel 5 show 100 % Hotter which challenges contestants with extreme looks to try out a new style . 
The programme - which airs tonight - will see the young woman from Manchester being asked to tone down her style by her fed-up boyfriend Ryan. 
On the programme Ryan, who complains her hair extensions get ‘everywhere’ when he’s lying in bed, says: “I’m going to nominate Summer because I want her to tone down her makeup and to see the real her for once. Summer doing her Barbie look (Photo: Naked Entertainment) Summer after her transformation (Photo: Naked Entertainment) 
"Everywhere we go, it’s like, I can see everyone just staring... I think she’s beautiful without all that makeup on.” 
Thankfully, fashion-fixers Karen Williams, Daniel Palmer and Melissa Sophia invite her into the studio to rescue the couple from break-up hell, the Manchester Evening News reports. 
Summer totters into the studio on her elevated platform heels and wearing a revealing sparkly bra, Barbie rings, tiara, and a revealing fish-net neon pink top. Everybody stares at Summer in her Barbie look, her boyfriend says (Photo: Naked Entertainment) Summer's new look is more subtle (Photo: Channel 5) Read More TV's John McCririck looks bizarre with a man bun after 100% Hotter makeover 
She tells the shocked fashionistas that she always gets ‘gets her boobs out’, even when she’s dressing down. 
But she admits she gets a lot of looks when she goes out – and not always for the right reasons. 
When her look is judged by the public, it’s rated as ‘over the top’ and ‘far too much’, and she gets a measly 4 out of 10. Summer used to sport peroxide hair (Photo: Naked Entertainment) Summer even liked a tiara to wear (Photo: Naked Entertainment) 
The team of experts get to work shovelling off her slap, and instead give her a cute brunette bob, a little black dress which covers her massive cleavage, neutral makeup and classy red heels. 
When her new look is revealed to Summer, she’s visibly overwhelmed, saying “Oh God! I look so different, thank you, love it, love the colour and my makeup just looks really natural as well, I love it. 
"My mum’s gonna love this.” Read More 
Impressed by her transformation, the public now rate her as a stunning 9 out of 10, and there’s no bigger fan than boyfriend Ryan. 
He says: “She looks fantastic, she’s amazing. I’ve always wanted to see her like this. 
“I’d score her a ten, she looks gorgeous.” 
100% Hotter will be shown on 5 Star tonight at 8pm. Like us on Facebook
